Package datastructure

Class VariablePosition

java.lang.Object
datastructure.VariablePosition
public final class VariablePosition
extends java.lang.Object
Represents and stores information about a single genomic position of one sample relative to a reference (genetic sequence).
Since:
2.0
Version:
2.0
Author:
Simon Hackl

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int alleleCount
    The number of alleles of the variable position.
    static char ALT_A
    Indicates an alternative base change to A.
    static char ALT_A_LOW_COV
    Indicates an alternative base change to A, but the coverage was low.
    static char ALT_A_LOW_FREQ
    Indicates an alternative base change to A, but the frequency was low.
    static char ALT_A_LOW_QUAL
    Indicates an alternative base change to A, but the quality was low.
    static char ALT_C
    Indicates an alternative base change to C.
    static char ALT_C_LOW_COV
    Indicates an alternative base change to C, but the coverage was low.
    static char ALT_C_LOW_FREQ
    Indicates an alternative base change to C, but the frequency was low.
    static char ALT_C_LOW_QUAL
    Indicates an alternative base change to C, but the quality was low.
    static char ALT_G
    Indicates an alternative base change to G.
    static char ALT_G_LOW_COV
    Indicates an alternative base change to G, but the coverage was low.
    static char ALT_G_LOW_FREQ
    Indicates an alternative base change to G, but the frequency was low.
    static char ALT_G_LOW_QUAL
    Indicates an alternative base change to G, but the quality was low.
    static char ALT_T
    Indicates an alternative base change to T.
    static char ALT_T_LOW_COV
    Indicates an alternative base change to T, but the coverage was low.
    static char ALT_T_LOW_FREQ
    Indicates an alternative base change to T, but the frequency was low.
    static char ALT_T_LOW_QUAL
    Indicates an alternative base change to T, but the quality was low.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> annotation
    A list of annotation strings of the position.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> content
    A list representing the content of the variable position, i.e.
    double coverage
    The coverage of the variable position, i.e. the number of reads spanning the position once mapped to the reference.
    static char DELETION
    Represents a deletion (relative to the reference).
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> frequency
    A list storing the allele frequencies of the variable position.
    double quality
    The Phred scaled quality of the variable position.
    static char REFERENCE
    Indicates that the reference base is given, no variation in this position.
    static char REFERENCE_LOW_COV
    Indicates that the reference base is given, but the position coverage was low.
    static char REFERENCE_LOW_QUAL
    Indicates that the reference base is given, but the position quality was low.

      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • content

      public final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> content
      A list representing the content of the variable position, i.e. DNA bases or related characters to indicate filtering values below specified thresholds (coverage, quality, frequency).

    • coverage

      public final double coverage
      The coverage of the variable position, i.e. the number of reads spanning the position once mapped to the reference.

    • quality

      public final double quality
      The Phred scaled quality of the variable position. For more information see: VCFv4.2.pdf.

    • annotation

      public final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> annotation
      A list of annotation strings of the position.

    • frequency

      public final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> frequency
      A list storing the allele frequencies of the variable position.

    • alleleCount

      public int alleleCount
      The number of alleles of the variable position.

  • Constructor Details

    • VariablePosition

      public VariablePosition​(char content, double coverage, double quality, java.lang.String annotation, double frequency)
      Constructs a VariablePosition with meta-information.
      Parameters:
      content - Character representing the variants base change.
      coverage - The coverage of the alternative.
      quality - The quality score of the alternative.
      annotation - Any annotations for the alternative.

  • Method Details

    • addAllele

      public void addAllele​(char content, java.lang.String annotation, double frequency)
      Method to add the information about a new alternate allele to the variable position.
      Parameters:
      content - Character representing the variant of the allele.
      annotation - String representing any annotations of the variant.
      frequency - Double representing the allele frequency.
